name: Reversal Pong
description: This game are make for the Livre Noel Jam, a brazilian small jam hosted by groups of game developer from brazilian universities. The Jam have 2 themes, who is not mandatory: Miracle and Make a Classic Diferent. I choose to remake the classic Pong with the premise of: You control the ball, not the bars. You only have to score a point, but the path to it is very dificult.
